title: Grimm Fairy Tales: Myths & Legends, Volume 3
description: When Edward finally moved away from his abusive home life, he thought he had escaped the cycle of violence that was his life. But when his younger brother, Drew, commits suicide, Edward must come back to the one place where he thought he would never return - home. Here, a monster awaits, and a journey in search of revenge that may well transform Edward into the very beast he fears the most Collecting Myths & Legends issues #12-15, as well as Grimm Fairy Tales #13 and #14.
author: Raven Gregory
